events.name: Tampa Bay Lightning at Utah Mammoth

headlines.description: — Jake Guentzel snapped a tie in the third period, and the Tampa Bay Lightning beat the Utah Mammoth 4-2 on Sunday for their fifth consecutive win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Guentzel scores in the 3rd period as the Lightning beat the Mammoth 4-2 for their 5th straight win

events.name: Columbus Blue Jackets at New York Islanders

headlines.description: — Rookie Matthew Schaefer and Simon Holmstrom scored 29 seconds apart late in the third period, helping the New York Islanders rally for a 3-2 win over the Columbus Blue Jackets on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Schaefer stars as the Islanders score 2 late goals to edge Blue Jackets 3-2

headlines.description: — Jonathan Huberdeau scored a pair of goals and the Calgary Flames defeated the Philadelphia Flyers 2-1 on Sunday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jonathan Huberdeau scores twice to lift Flames over Flyers 2-1

events.name: New Jersey Devils at Anaheim Ducks

headlines.description: — Cutter Gauthier and Beckett Sennecke each had a goal and an assist, goalie Lukas Dostal made 32 saves, and the Anaheim Ducks beat the New Jersey Devils 4-1 on Sunday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cutter Gauthier, Beckett Sennecke tally goal and assist to lead Ducks 4-1 over Devils

events.name: Detroit Red Wings at San Jose Sharks

headlines.description: — James van Riemsdyk scored in the fourth round of a shootout, lifting the Detroit Red Wings past the San Jose Sharks 3-2 on Sunday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: James van Riemsdyk's shootout goal lifts Red Wings over Sharks 3-2
